original_title: Crime Scene Clean Up: The Real Crime Scene Investigation
overview: Crime Scene Clean-Up goes behind the scenes into a world few have had to enter â€“ the bloody aftermath of a traumatic crime scene. After the cops and coroner have come and gone, leaving their fingerprint dust and discarded gloves behind, what happens then? Who cleans up after death? Meet Ron Gospodarski, a man with unusual insight into a crime scene. Ron's business is to clean up after death, a business born out of the concerns of blood tainted by TB, Hepatitis and AIDS. Follow Ron on his daily journey through New York City.
title: Crime Scene Clean Up: The Real Crime Scene Investigation
